alert.note: Alert for Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 10:59PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lincoln County through 1130 PM MDT... At 1059 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Boyero to 10 miles south of Forder, or along a line extending from 29 miles south of Flagler to 37 miles north of North La Junta. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Forder, Boyero and Karval. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County
